GRP  SYS  HOSTNAME         IP
[1]  +    localhost        127.0.0.1
          laptop           127.0.1.1
[2]  +    ip6-localhost    ::1
     +    ip6-loopback     ::1
          ip6-localnet     fe00::0
          ip6-mcastprefix  ff00::0
          ip6-allnodes     ff02::1
          ip6-allrouters   ff02::2
